title: House avail Now, Furnished, nr Cherry Creek Mall Modern HugeYard,
posting_body: Available NOW
RARE- you will NOT find a home available like this in central Denver
FURNISHED -Prefer
Longer Long Term, either 3 months or 8 months or 10 months (with option to renew)
Mid Century
Huge yard
RARE Availability for single, roommates or a couple in Best LOCATION -
Charming Modern Mid Century MCM Ranch HOUSE in safe Cherry Creek neighborhood, central Denver, Colorado ,
5 blocks from Cherry Creek Mall
Neighborhood with HUGE Country-like setting yard (apple trees and grape vines, garden friendly).
****INCREDIBLE LOCATION!
Walk to Cherry Creek Mall (5 blocks), Bike trails (2 blocks), restaurants (2 blocks), parks (2 blocks)...
12 min to downtown , 15-20 min to CU (university of Colorado) Medical Center Anschutz
2 Bedroom, house is in excellent wonderfully maintained condition.
Convertible sofa in Living room AND in office to sleep extra guests.
Brand NEW Full Kitchen-New white Shaker soft close cabinets,
White Carrera Quartz countertops
Breakfast bar counter height
Large cooking counter
Wood Floors throughout (retro tile kitchen)
Open concept
STAINLESS appliances (French Door Refrigerator with bottom freezer,
high end slide-in GAS range, dishwasher,
2 basin sink-one small side and one large side, garbage disposal, shelf microwave,
Extra Large fenced yard with automatic sprinkler system and mow/trim/blow included (tenant ultimately responsible for yard- can do it yourself or hire, Landlord will pay for the mowing etc)
USB built-in in kitchen
Lots of FREE parking ( 2 dedicated spots in back driveway) INCLUDED, no garage...
and ALWAYS a place to park right in front on the street.
Lots large windows-natural light, bright and cheery.
Light and so bright with 2 doors out to the yard (front and kitchen)
No walking into any hallways any more!
Stacked washer/ dryer-FULL SIZE
New insulation so low utilities.
Window A/Cs included.
*Primary with King bed and very high quality mattress
*Second bedroom smaller w smaller closet set is set up now as an office.
with a convertible sofa futon sleeper.
Back patio with patio dining set/ umbrella Modern Conversation sectional fire pit and Vermont Castings grill.
Walking/ running trails and parks nearby.
Cherry Creek Trail.
Ride bike to Anchutz, University of Colorado CU Medical Center.
Shopping (Cherry Creek Mall 5 blocks), restaurants, grocery, Trader Joe's, Snooze, Super Target...I25/I70
In boundary for *Steck elementary School.
Great neighbors
Near Rose Medical, minutes to National Jewish Hospital and close to St Joseph's, St Luke's, Presbyterian, and central to all the others out west or south.
PERFECT for a couple, Friends/ Roommates, separation/divorce, remote work from home (WFH), Travel Nurses, Resident, residency, Executive, Corperate,
Semi-Flexible Move in date beginning of AUG
Less than 6 Mos($3195) /
6months or longer ( to a year) $2995/m
One Dog with deposit and animal rent can be discussed:) no puppies.
income added together must be $8000/mo.
Private Independent Landlord has 5 star reviews!
We are NOT a large property management company, we care.
Flexible Owner/ landlord.
Please email or call/text ( best to text) ***with all your details and your "must haves"***
This is attached to a studio by a lock-off door.
IF that studio gets rented again, (soonest would be many months away) then the HUGE YARD, Back patio, Grill, firepit would be shared.
For this reason, the $3495/ mo rent has been decreased and yours will NOT increase -NO
ONE lives there now
Prefer no animal (first choice prospective tenants), but will consider a dog with nr deposit $350 and $55/mo rent
third tenant adds $200/ mo
ALL UTILITIES are included for 3 months with the 3 month rental.
EVERYTHING!
